title: Full Stack Developer
description:
Agilno is a software development company that helps product-led North American companies plan, design, develop & optimize digital products, driving revenue and engagement. Through technology and close collaboration, our friendly, open-minded, and professional team has created digital products making a huge impact on people's lives for the last 8 years!

  

Position Overview:


We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Full Stack Developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in both front-end and back-end development, with a passion for building scalable and efficient web applications. Reporting to the Project Team Lead, the Full Stack Developer will play a key role in developing and maintaining software projects from concept to completion.

**Requirements:**

* Minimum of 3 years of experience in full stack development.
* Proficiency in front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like React.
* Strong experience with back-end development using Python, Node.js.
* Knowledge of database technologies such as SQL, NoSQL, and experience with database design and management.
* Familiarity with version control systems such as Git.
* Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
* Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team environment.
* Excellent communication skills and ability to translate technical concepts into understandable terms for non-technical stakeholders.
* Excellent knowledge of the English language (written and spoken).

**Responsibilities:**

* Design, develop, and maintain robust and scalable web applications using modern web technologies.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including designers, product managers, and other developers, to define project requirements and deliver solutions that meet client needs.
* Develop front-end components using frameworks such as React, ensuring responsive and intuitive user interfaces.
* Implement server-side logic using Python, Node.js ensuring high performance and security.
* Integrate third-party APIs and services to enhance application functionality.
* Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability, employing best practices in coding and testing.
* Conduct code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members to maintain code quality.
* Stay current with emerging technologies and industry trends, continuously improving development practices and processes.

**Bonus Points:**

* Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS.
* Familiarity with DevOps practices and tools like Docker and Kubernetes.
* Experience in an Agile development environment.
* Previous experience working in a software development agency.

**Benefits:**

* Employment agreement of indefinite duration.
* Eligible candidate must be able to be legally employed in Canada on full time basis.
* Competitive salary based on experience and qualifications: Position salaries are transparent to every team member. For mid level position, a salary ranges between 80K – 100K per year, depending on your level of expertise. By achieving the expected results, you will have a chance to move up the ladder.
* You can expect bonuses for dedicated performance and also a Christmas bonus at the end of the year.
* Collaborative and supportive work environment, fostering innovation and creativity: Working from home or office? It doesn't matter as long as your job is well done. Also, flexible hours give you a balance between your work and private life.
* Opportunities for professional development and career growth: We care about your development and growth. Our internal training program includes cool lectures and workshops, while there is an education budget for external training.
* Paid time off and flexible work hours, promoting work-life balance: In addition to regular vacation days, regardless of the seniority level, all our employees get a one-week vacation bonus.
* Become a Macbook fan like the rest of the team, and let's follow the latest trends in the market. The equipment is yours to use, and you are free to take it with you.
* Health insurance coverage and other employee benefits: Additional health insurance is fully provided by us.
* 20 days per worked year of paid vacation

**How to Apply:** If you meet the qualifications and are excited about the opportunity to join our team, please submit your resume and a cover letter highlighting your relevant experience and accomplishments to ivana@agilno.com

**Additional application instructions or requirements:**

* Only qualified shortlisted candidates will be contacted
* Screened/shortlisted candidates may expect to complete an offline task.

*Agilno* is an equal opportunity employer and values diversity in the workplace. We encourage candidates from all backgrounds to apply.

title: Senior Developer
description:
At CI, we see a great place to work as one that is a safe place for everyone to have a voice, where people are empowered to take ownership over meaningful work, where there is an opportunity to grow through stretching themselves, where they can work on innovative products and projects, and where employees are supported and engaged in doing so.
Our company is looking for a Senior React Developer to join our team. We’re building a large wealth application with the front end built in React 18. We pride ourselves on using the right tools for the job, thus far we’re using a combination of vanilla react (vite build), react query, radix, TRPC and jotai - all written in typescript. Our application principal is looking for a front-end focused leader to augment his team.
Responsibilities:* Design and implement key front end features and services alongside our product principal for our browser app;
* Ensure web operations and non-functional system requirements are met;
* You should have good experience with unit, integration and e2e testing react apps
* Ensuring development and consistent implementation of our design patterns as well as refactoring existing patterns where needed
* Help the team stay up-to-date with new trends in FE development;
* Demonstrate the ability to adapt and work with team members of various experience level;
* Collaborate to come up with great app and service solutions;.
* Mentor our juniors and pair them as necessary.


CI Financial is an independent company offering global wealth management and asset management advisory services through diverse financial services firms. Since 1965, we have consistently anticipated and responded to the changing needs of investors. We are driven by a commitment to provide individuals and institutions with the highest-quality investments and advice. Our commitment to the highest levels of performance means that whatever their position, CI employees must be comfortable in a fast-paced environment that will stretch them to tap into their highest potential. Employees with a healthy dose of ambition, a desire to commit to a curious mindset for continuous learning, and a willingness to go the extra mile thrive at CI.
WHAT WE OFFER* Modern HQ location within walking distance from Union Station
* Flexible & Hybrid Work Program
* Equipment Purchase Program
* Training Reimbursement
* Paid Professional Designations
* Employee Share Purchase Program (ESPP)
* Corporate Discount Program
* Enhanced group benefits
* Parental Leave Top–up program
* Fitness membership discounts
* Volunteer paid Days
* Complimentary vending machines

  

We are focused on building a diverse and inclusive workforce. If you are excited about this role and are not confident you meet all the qualification requirements, we encourage you to apply to investigate the opportunity further.
Please submit your resume in confidence by clicking “Apply”. Only qualified candidates selected for an interview will be contacted. CI Financial Corp. and all of our affiliates (“CI”) are committed to fair and accessible employment practices and provide reasonable accommodations for persons with disabilities. If you require accommodations in order to apply for any job opportunities, require this posting in an additional format, or require accommodation at any stage of the recruitment process please contact us at accessible.recruitment@ci.com, or call 416-364-1145 ext. 4747.

title: 3D Graphics Engineer
description:
Luxolis is a cutting-edge 3D digital twin company that specializes in creating immersive and interactive digital representations of physical spaces. We are seeking a talented Full Stack JavaScript Developer to join our dynamic team and help us revolutionize the way people experience and interact with the built environment. As a Full Stack JavaScript Developer at Luxolis, you will play a pivotal role in developing and maintaining our innovative 3D digital twin platform.

Responsibilities:

**Front-End Development:**Develop and maintain user-friendly, responsive web applications for 3D visualization and interaction.  
Implement stunning and immersive user interfaces using modern JavaScript frameworks and libraries (e.g., React, Three.js).  
Collaborate with UX/UI designers to ensure a seamless and visually appealing user experience.  
Optimize web applications for performance and compatibility across various browsers and devices.

**Back-End Development:**Design, develop, and maintain server-side components and APIs.  
Handle data storage, retrieval, and manipulation efficiently and securely.  
Implement authentication and authorization mechanisms to ensure data privacy and security.  
Integrate third-party APIs and services as needed for functionality and data enrichment.

**Database Management:**Design and maintain databases to store complex 3D spatial data efficiently.  
Optimize database queries for fast retrieval and scalability.  
Ensure data integrity and security through proper data modeling and access controls.

**3D Visualization and Interaction:**Collaborate with 3D artists and engineers to integrate 3D models and assets into web applications.  
Implement interactive features for users to explore and interact with 3D digital twins.  
Optimize 3D rendering for performance and realism.

**Testing and Debugging:**Write unit tests and perform thorough debugging to ensure the reliability and stability of the application.  
Conduct code reviews and collaborate with team members to maintain code quality.

**Continuous Integration and Deployment:**Implement CI/CD pipelines for automated testing and deployment of web applications.

**Documentation and Collaboration:**Maintain clear and comprehensive documentation of code, APIs, and systems.  
Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams including 3D artists, designers, and product managers.

Requirements:

* Proven experience as aWe are seeking a talented and experienced 3D Graphics Engineer to join our team. As a 3D Graphics Engineer, you will be responsible for developing cutting-edge 3D graphics and rendering solutions. Your expertise in C++, JavaScript, Python, and your understanding of progressive rendering techniques will be essential to drive the development of visually stunning applications and experiences.

**Responsibilities:**

**3D Graphics Development:** Design and implement high-performance 3D graphics solutions for a variety of applications, including real-time simulations, interactive experiences, and visualization tools.

**Rendering Optimization:** Optimize rendering pipelines, shaders, and algorithms to achieve real-time or near-real-time performance on target platforms.

**Progressive Rendering:** Implement progressive rendering techniques to ensure smooth and visually appealing graphics rendering, adapting to different hardware capabilities.

**Cross-Platform Compatibility:** Ensure compatibility and performance across multiple platforms, including desktop, mobile, and web.

**C++, JavaScript, and Python Development:** Utilize your expertise in C++, JavaScript, and Python to build and maintain graphics codebases, as well as support integration into existing applications.

**Shader Development:** Create and optimize shaders for various rendering techniques, such as deferred rendering, physically based rendering (PBR), and special effects.

**Performance Profiling:** Identify performance bottlenecks and work on performance profiling and optimization of graphics code.

**Collaboration:** Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including software developers, artists, and designers, to integrate 3D graphics into larger projects.

**Documentation:** Maintain clear and comprehensive documentation of graphics code and techniques for knowledge sharing and future reference.

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Computer Graphics, or a related field.
* Proven experience in 3D graphics programming, including rendering pipelines, shaders, and graphics optimization.
* Proficiency in programming languages such as C++, JavaScript, and Python.
* Understanding of progressive rendering techniques and algorithms.
* Experience with graphics APIs and libraries such as OpenGL, WebGL, DirectX, or Vulkan.
* Familiarity with 3D modeling and animation concepts.
* Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot and debug complex graphics issues.
* Knowledge of real-time rendering techniques, including lighting, shadowing, and post-processing effects.
* Experience with game engines (e.g., Unity, Unreal Engine) is a plus.
* Knowledge of web-based graphics technologies (e.g., Three.js, WebGL) is a plus.
* Excellent communication and teamwork skills.

**Company Culture:**

Our company fosters a culture of creativity, innovation, and collaboration. We believe in pushing the boundaries of 3D graphics to create immersive and engaging experiences for our users. Join us in shaping the future of interactive 3D graphics and making a significant impact in the industry.

If you are a motivated 3D Graphics Engineer with a passion for cutting-edge graphics technologies and the skills outlined above, we encourage you to apply and be part of our dynamic team. Full Stack JavaScript Developer or similar role.

* Strong proficiency in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and related web technologies.
* Experience with modern front-end libraries and frameworks (e.g., React, Three.js).
* Proficiency in server-side development using Node.js and related technologies.
* Solid understanding of relational and NoSQL databases.
* Familiarity with RESTful APIs and GraphQL.
* Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git).
* Knowledge of web security best practices.
* Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.
* Strong communication and collaboration abilities.
* Experience with 3D graphics, WebGL, or gaming development is a plus.

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: $60,000.00-$70,000.00 per year

title: Software Developer
description:
Job Summary:
The Software Developer will contribute to the iterative evolution of our new Platform in Microsoft Azure. You will also create applications and tools used to design, develop, and maintain the platform. This role will work closely with other teams to gather infrastructure requirements, documents procedures, troubleshoot complex issues and implement deployment automation solutions. The Software Developer will be a self-starter and multi-tasker working in a fast-paced environment.
Job Description:
Duties/Responsibilities:* Works closely with business users, application development, application architecture, and software release management teams to gather requirements.
* Supports infrastructure from an engineering, security, and architecture perspective.
* Assists in managing the complete software development process from conception to deployment.
* Working knowledge of Kubernetes and Docker recommended, not required.
* Focus on developing, implementing, and operationalizing cloud solutions that are highly available and resilient by utilizing best practices in systems engineering, network engineering, and multi-region design strategies.
* Documents standards, processes, workflows, and policies around applications and underlying infrastructure.
* Identify, troubleshoot, and resolve highly complex application and infrastructure issues.
* Writing clean, functional code both on the front- and back-end.
* Creating and configuring APIs
* Designs, implements, and refines Microsoft Azure cloud solutions across multiple tenants with various networking and scalability using infrastructure-as-code.
* Understands Infrastructure-as-Code and/or Microsoft Azure Resource Manager.
* Writes and follows Standard Operating Procedures for knowledge transfer and continuity.
* Performs ongoing performance tuning, hardware upgrades, and resource optimization as required. Maintains alert monitoring platform and validate alerting solutions; resize virtual platforms as needed.


Required Skills/Abilities:* Experience in the following programming languages: C#, ASP.NET (Blazor experience is an asset)
* Knowledge in multiple front-end languages and libraries (HTML/CSS)
* Familiar with Azure Windows Virtual Desktop (WVD) VDI environment and has a good understanding of creating custom images, deploying, assigning, and maintaining Azure (WVD) environment.
* Familiar with Azure Firewalls, Network Security Groups, VNets, and route tables.
* Demonstrable experience creating and managing CI/CD pipelines using tools such as Azure DevOps.
* Passion for eliminating repetitive manual processes using automation.
* Strong sense of ownership, customer service, and integrity demonstrated through clear communication and positive action.
* Experience with relational databases (MS SQL, Oracle, etc)
* Strong problem solving and analytical skills.
* Strong work ethic and the ability to deliver solutions under deadline.


Education and Experience:* B.A./B.S. in Computer Science or related discipline and/or equivalent, relevant work experience
* 5+ years of experience in design/development of complex software applications of object-oriented and multi-tiered systems preferred


Physical Requirements:* Prolonged periods sitting at a desk and working on a computer/laptop.
* Must be able to lift up to 15 pounds at a time.
* This role does require the ability to travel up to 10%


Disclaimers:* All job requirements are subject to possible revision to reflect changes in the position requirements or to reasonably accommodate individuals with disabilities. Some requirements may exclude individuals who pose a threat or risk to the health and safety of themselves or other employees.
* This job description in no way states or implies that these are the only duties to which will be required in this position. Employees will be required to follow other job-related duties as requested by their supervisor/manager (within guidelines and compliance with Federal and State Laws). Continued employment remains on an “at-will” basis.
* Vontas remains and actively participates as an Equal Opportunity Employer/Affirmative Action Employer.


Worker Type:
Regular
Number of Openings Available:
1
We thank all applicants for their interest; however, only those who qualify for an interview will be contacted. \\*Professional recruiting agents or consultants need not call.

title: AEM UI Developer - React.js , jQuery - 10yers Experience
description:
**Role: AEM UI Developer**
**Location: Toronto****Hybrid**Role Description:


Design, develop, unit test and support front-end web applications that are responsive and cross-browser compatible.


Create reusable components in AEM using HTL(Slightly), JavaScript/jQuery/ReactJS/Angular.


Participate in functional and technical designs.


Collaborate with UX architects on web accessible page designs.


Experience working with UI specifications and defined style guide.


Experience in Requirement Analysis and Estimation.? Ensure coding, testing, debugging and implementation activities are completed as required.


Ensure web accessibility requirements are met

  

  

Competencies: Digital : HTML5-CSS3, Digital : Adobe Experience Manager (AEM)  

Experience (Years): 8-10

  

  

Essential Skills:


Strong technical skills, with at least 8+ years of development experience in front-end Design and Development.


Solid understanding and hands-on experience with AEM HTL (Slightly), Bootstrap, HTML5, CSS3, SASS, JavaScript, jQuery, React.js, Typescript, Angular, Node.js, API?s, NPM.


Proficient with web accessibility (WCAG AA compliance)? Hands-on experience with integrating website development and API/web services (Soap/XML, REST/JSON)


Familiar with using browser developer tools? Flexible and adaptable with the ability to align to changing priorities in multiple projects? Ability to work both independently and collaborate within a team  

Desirable Skills: Hands on experience with Version control/Devops tools(Git, Jenkins, SourceTree, etc)


Experience with assistive tools like JAWS/NVDA


Unit testing framework knowledge? Have Leadership, Analytical and Communication skills


Agile Trained? Knowledge on AEM? Worked with High chart and Parsley JS libraries

title: Lead BackEnd Developer (Contract)
description:
BIMM is booming, so we're looking for an experienced **Lead BackEnd Developer** to join our team!



As we observe a hybrid model, this role will require you to be in office at BIMM HQ (Distillery District) up to 2 days per week.


**Who we are**



BIMM is a Toronto-based agency that lives at the intersection of data, technology, and creativity to provide clients with high-performing campaigns and digital products that shape connected customer experiences. We've helped our clients implement fully integrated CRM customer journeys, built robust digital experiences, and created national loyalty programs with decades of experience in sectors of automotive, financial, telco and retail.



We are creative realists, which means our ideas and solutions are grounded in the realities of our clients' business. We believe big ideas are nothing without big results (and flawless execution); high-performing agencies deliver high-performing campaigns, products, and experiences; and the best solutions happen when we collaborate with clients as partners.



Our Technology department is a 30+ person distributed team of Developers, QA, and Architects delivering amazing digital products on a leading-edge technology stack.


**Who we're looking for**



As a Lead BackEnd Developer, you will work cross-functionally with the product team, front-end engineers, architects, and QA. You will work with and help mentor other back-end engineers, help architect solutions to problems, and communicate with leadership about the needs of your team.



You use modern tools and frameworks and can code up an application from scratch and spin it up on your favorite infrastructure. You have a clear understanding of security and build it into any of your services. Although you have the full support of both business and technology members, you are able to lead the research and solution of complex problems. At the same time, you know when to ask for help and don't let silly pride or ego get in the way, because even as a team lead you are part of a bigger team.



"Initiative" is your middle name and you don't give us a chance to chase you. We are on the hunt for people who have an innovative mindset (you still dream of that moonshot project, but are currently working on your side-gig)! Is this you?


**Requirements**


* 7+ years of relevant software engineering experience with server-side frameworks and languages
* 3+ years of Node.js experience
* Experience working with GraphQL
* Prior experience as a team lead or a lead architect supporting several developers
* Prior experience with a variety of tools used to perform unit testing, automated builds, and source control
* You can demonstrate experience from at least one large scale project
* AWS knowledge - ideally some certifications or equivalent experience
* Developing high-performance applications by writing testable, reusable, and efficient code
* Developing and maintaining all server-side network components
* Ensuring optimal performance of the backend services and responsiveness to front-end requests
* Close collaboration with front-end developers and architects
* Implementing effective security protocols, data protection measures, and storage solutions
* Running diagnostic tests, repairing defects, and providing technical support
* Documenting backend processes, including database schemas, as well as preparing reports
* Recommending and implementing improvements to processes and technologies
* Able to rapidly pick up new concepts and technologies


**Nice to have**


* Computer Science Degree
* Familiarity with Apollo Studio
* Knowledge of Docker, k8s
* Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines preferably Github Actions
* Knowledge of MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB
* Familiarity with GCP


**What's in it for you?**


* Culture: Our squad is fun, friendly and entirely egoless. Our social committee plans BIMM bashes,Tasty Thursdays and quarterly outings like candle making workshops, board game nights, Jays games and cooking classes. Our summer and holiday parties are quite memorable as well! Having Fun Everyday is one of our core values.
* We believe in working & meeting with purpose. We observe a hybrid working model in our beautiful dog-friendly office located in the Distillery District, stuffed with snacks.
* Belonging: Our dedicated DEI committee provides thought-provoking insights which are reflected in our work; They also organize engaging awareness activities and events to showcase BIMMER's professional talents and personalities. What talents might you bring? :)


BIMM is committed to providing an environment that is inclusive and accessible. We are an equal opportunity employer and consider all applicants for employment without discrimination. Please let us know if accommodation for the recruitment/interview process is required and we will work with you to make sure your needs are met.

title: Senior Shopify Developer
description:
### **Senior Shopify Developer**


At Cognizant, our global community sets us apart—an upbeat, collaborative and inclusive workplace where everyone can thrive. And with projects at the forefront of innovation, you can build a varied, rewarding career and draw inspiration from dedicated colleagues and leaders. Cognizant is right where you belong.


### **What you’ll do**


* **Lead Development Projects:** Take ownership of the development lifecycle, including planning, design, development, testing, deployment, and maintenance of Shopify Plus solutions.
* **Headless Commerce Implementation:** Architect, develop, and maintain headless commerce solutions using Shopify Plus and modern front-end technologies (e.g., React, Vue.js, Next.js, or similar).
* **API Integration:** Integrate Shopify Plus with various third-party services and APIs to improve functionality and user experience.
* **Custom Development:** Build custom Shopify apps and modify existing features to meet client-specific requirements.
* **Performance Optimization:** Ensure dedication, scalability, and security of e-commerce platforms.
* **Team Leadership:** Mentor and guide junior developers, conduct code reviews, and champion a collaborative and innovative development environment.
* **Client Collaboration:** Work closely with clients to understand their needs, provide technical expertise, and ensure successful project delivery.
* **Stay Updated:** Keep abreast of the latest trends and standard methodologies in Shopify development, headless commerce, and e-commerce technologies.

### **What you bring to the role**


* **Overall experience**: Minimum 6 years in eCommerce or related areas. As well as, experience with eCommerce platforms like Magento, BigCommerce, and/or Kibo Commerce.
* **Shopify Plus Expertise:** At least 4 years of experience with custom development, theme customization, and app integration.
* **Headless Commerce Proficiency:** Hands-on experience with headless commerce architecture and development using technologies like React, Vue.js, Next.js, GraphQL, and REST APIs.
* **Full-Stack Development:** Solid grasp of front-end and back-end technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, and related frameworks.
* **API Development:** Experience in crafting and consuming RESTful and GraphQL APIs.
* **Problem-Solving:** Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to tackle complex issues.
* **Communication:** Strong communication skills to optimally collaborate with clients, team members, and stakeholders.
* **Agile Methodologies:** Experience with Agile development methodologies and practices.
* **DevOps:** Familiarity with DevOps practices and tools for continuous integration and deployment.
* **Certifications:** Shopify or relevant technical certifications.

### **Working arrangements**


We strive to provide flexibility wherever possible. Based on this role’s business requirements, this is a remote position open to qualified applicants in Ontario and/or Nova Scotia, where our hubs are located. Regardless of your working arrangement, we are here to support a healthy work-life balance though our various wellbeing programs.


Note: The working arrangements for this role are accurate as of the date of posting. This may change based on the project you’re engaged in, as well as business and client requirements. Rest assured; we will always be clear about role expectations.

Conduct code reviews and collaborate with team members to maintain code quality.

**Documentation and Collaboration:**Maintain clear and comprehensive documentation of code, APIs, and systems.  
Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams including 3D artists, designers, and product managers.

Requirements:

* Proven experience as aWe are seeking a talented and experienced 3D Graphics Engineer to join our team. As a 3D Graphics Engineer, you will be responsible for developing cutting-edge 3D graphics and rendering solutions. Your expertise in C++, JavaScript, Python, and your understanding of progressive rendering techniques will be essential to drive the development of visually stunning applications and experiences.

**Responsibilities:**

**3D Graphics Development:** Design and implement high-performance 3D graphics solutions for a variety of applications, including real-time simulations, interactive experiences, and visualization tools.

**Rendering Optimization:** Optimize rendering pipelines, shaders, and algorithms to achieve real-time or near-real-time performance on target platforms.

**Progressive Rendering:** Implement progressive rendering techniques to ensure smooth and visually appealing graphics rendering, adapting to different hardware capabilities.

**Cross-Platform Compatibility:** Ensure compatibility and performance across multiple platforms, including desktop, mobile, and web.

**C++, JavaScript, and Python Development:** Utilize your expertise in C++, JavaScript, and Python to build and maintain graphics codebases, as well as support integration into existing applications.

**Shader Development:** Create and optimize shaders for various rendering techniques, such as deferred rendering, physically based rendering (PBR), and special effects.

**Performance Profiling:** Identify performance bottlenecks and work on performance profiling and optimization of graphics code.

**Collaboration:** Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including software developers, artists, and designers, to integrate 3D graphics into larger projects.

**Documentation:** Maintain clear and comprehensive documentation of graphics code and techniques for knowledge sharing and future reference.

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Computer Graphics, or a related field.
* Proven experience in 3D graphics programming, including rendering pipelines, shaders, and graphics optimization.
* Proficiency in programming languages such as C++, JavaScript, and Python.
* Understanding of progressive rendering techniques and algorithms.
* Experience with graphics APIs and libraries such as OpenGL, WebGL, DirectX, or Vulkan.
* Familiarity with 3D modeling and animation concepts.
* Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot and debug complex graphics issues.
* Knowledge of real-time rendering techniques, including lighting, shadowing, and post-processing effects.
* Experience with game engines (e.g., Unity, Unreal Engine) is a plus.
* Knowledge of web-based graphics technologies (e.g., Three.js, WebGL) is a plus.
* Excellent communication and teamwork skills.

**Company Culture:**

Our company fosters a culture of creativity, innovation, and collaboration. We believe in pushing the boundaries of 3D graphics to create immersive and engaging experiences for our users. Join us in shaping the future of interactive 3D graphics and making a significant impact in the industry.

If you are a motivated 3D Graphics Engineer with a passion for cutting-edge graphics technologies and the skills outlined above, we encourage you to apply and be part of our dynamic team. Full Stack JavaScript Developer or similar role.

* Strong proficiency in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and related web technologies.
* Experience with modern front-end libraries and frameworks (e.g., React, Three.js).
* Proficiency in server-side development using Node.js and related technologies.
* Solid understanding of relational and NoSQL databases.
* Familiarity with RESTful APIs and GraphQL.
* Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git).
* Knowledge of web security best practices.
* Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.
* Strong communication and collaboration abilities.
* Experience with 3D graphics, WebGL, or gaming development is a plus.

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: $60,000.00-$70,000.00 per year

title: Lead BackEnd Developer (Contract)
description:
BIMM is booming, so we're looking for an experienced **Lead BackEnd Developer** to join our team!



As we observe a hybrid model, this role will require you to be in office at BIMM HQ (Distillery District) up to 2 days per week.


**Who we are**



BIMM is a Toronto-based agency that lives at the intersection of data, technology, and creativity to provide clients with high-performing campaigns and digital products that shape connected customer experiences. We've helped our clients implement fully integrated CRM customer journeys, built robust digital experiences, and created national loyalty programs with decades of experience in sectors of automotive, financial, telco and retail.



We are creative realists, which means our ideas and solutions are grounded in the realities of our clients' business. We believe big ideas are nothing without big results (and flawless execution); high-performing agencies deliver high-performing campaigns, products, and experiences; and the best solutions happen when we collaborate with clients as partners.



Our Technology department is a 30+ person distributed team of Developers, QA, and Architects delivering amazing digital products on a leading-edge technology stack.


**Who we're looking for**



As a Lead BackEnd Developer, you will work cross-functionally with the product team, front-end engineers, architects, and QA. You will work with and help mentor other back-end engineers, help architect solutions to problems, and communicate with leadership about the needs of your team.



You use modern tools and frameworks and can code up an application from scratch and spin it up on your favorite infrastructure. You have a clear understanding of security and build it into any of your services. Although you have the full support of both business and technology members, you are able to lead the research and solution of complex problems. At the same time, you know when to ask for help and don't let silly pride or ego get in the way, because even as a team lead you are part of a bigger team.



"Initiative" is your middle name and you don't give us a chance to chase you. We are on the hunt for people who have an innovative mindset (you still dream of that moonshot project, but are currently working on your side-gig)! Is this you?


**Requirements**


* 7+ years of relevant software engineering experience with server-side frameworks and languages
* 3+ years of Node.js experience
* Experience working with GraphQL
* Prior experience as a team lead or a lead architect supporting several developers
* Prior experience with a variety of tools used to perform unit testing, automated builds, and source control
* You can demonstrate experience from at least one large scale project
* AWS knowledge - ideally some certifications or equivalent experience
* Developing high-performance applications by writing testable, reusable, and efficient code
* Developing and maintaining all server-side network components
* Ensuring optimal performance of the backend services and responsiveness to front-end requests
* Close collaboration with front-end developers and architects
* Implementing effective security protocols, data protection measures, and storage solutions
* Running diagnostic tests, repairing defects, and providing technical support
* Documenting backend processes, including database schemas, as well as preparing reports
* Recommending and implementing improvements to processes and technologies
* Able to rapidly pick up new concepts and technologies


**Nice to have**


* Computer Science Degree
* Familiarity with Apollo Studio
* Knowledge of Docker, k8s
* Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines preferably Github Actions
* Knowledge of MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB
* Familiarity with GCP


**What's in it for you?**


* Culture: Our squad is fun, friendly and entirely egoless. Our social committee plans BIMM bashes,Tasty Thursdays and quarterly outings like candle making workshops, board game nights, Jays games and cooking classes. Our summer and holiday parties are quite memorable as well! Having Fun Everyday is one of our core values.
* We believe in working & meeting with purpose. We observe a hybrid working model in our beautiful dog-friendly office located in the Distillery District, stuffed with snacks.
* Belonging: Our dedicated DEI committee provides thought-provoking insights which are reflected in our work; They also organize engaging awareness activities and events to showcase BIMMER's professional talents and personalities. What talents might you bring? :)


BIMM is committed to providing an environment that is inclusive and accessible. We are an equal opportunity employer and consider all applicants for employment without discrimination. Please let us know if accommodation for the recruitment/interview process is required and we will work with you to make sure your needs are met.

title: Software Developer
description:
Job Summary:
The Software Developer will contribute to the iterative evolution of our new Platform in Microsoft Azure. You will also create applications and tools used to design, develop, and maintain the platform. This role will work closely with other teams to gather infrastructure requirements, documents procedures, troubleshoot complex issues and implement deployment automation solutions. The Software Developer will be a self-starter and multi-tasker working in a fast-paced environment.
Job Description:
Duties/Responsibilities:* Works closely with business users, application development, application architecture, and software release management teams to gather requirements.
* Supports infrastructure from an engineering, security, and architecture perspective.
* Assists in managing the complete software development process from conception to deployment.
* Working knowledge of Kubernetes and Docker recommended, not required.
* Focus on developing, implementing, and operationalizing cloud solutions that are highly available and resilient by utilizing best practices in systems engineering, network engineering, and multi-region design strategies.
* Documents standards, processes, workflows, and policies around applications and underlying infrastructure.
* Identify, troubleshoot, and resolve highly complex application and infrastructure issues.
* Writing clean, functional code both on the front- and back-end.
* Creating and configuring APIs
* Designs, implements, and refines Microsoft Azure cloud solutions across multiple tenants with various networking and scalability using infrastructure-as-code.
* Understands Infrastructure-as-Code and/or Microsoft Azure Resource Manager.
* Writes and follows Standard Operating Procedures for knowledge transfer and continuity.
* Performs ongoing performance tuning, hardware upgrades, and resource optimization as required. Maintains alert monitoring platform and validate alerting solutions; resize virtual platforms as needed.


Required Skills/Abilities:* Experience in the following programming languages: C#, ASP.NET (Blazor experience is an asset)
* Knowledge in multiple front-end languages and libraries (HTML/CSS)
* Familiar with Azure Windows Virtual Desktop (WVD) VDI environment and has a good understanding of creating custom images, deploying, assigning, and maintaining Azure (WVD) environment.
* Familiar with Azure Firewalls, Network Security Groups, VNets, and route tables.
* Demonstrable experience creating and managing CI/CD pipelines using tools such as Azure DevOps.
* Passion for eliminating repetitive manual processes using automation.
* Strong sense of ownership, customer service, and integrity demonstrated through clear communication and positive action.
* Experience with relational databases (MS SQL, Oracle, etc)
* Strong problem solving and analytical skills.
* Strong work ethic and the ability to deliver solutions under deadline.


Education and Experience:* B.A./B.S. in Computer Science or related discipline and/or equivalent, relevant work experience
* 5+ years of experience in design/development of complex software applications of object-oriented and multi-tiered systems preferred


Physical Requirements:* Prolonged periods sitting at a desk and working on a computer/laptop.
* Must be able to lift up to 15 pounds at a time.
* This role does require the ability to travel up to 10%


Disclaimers:* All job requirements are subject to possible revision to reflect changes in the position requirements or to reasonably accommodate individuals with disabilities. Some requirements may exclude individuals who pose a threat or risk to the health and safety of themselves or other employees.
* This job description in no way states or implies that these are the only duties to which will be required in this position. Employees will be required to follow other job-related duties as requested by their supervisor/manager (within guidelines and compliance with Federal and State Laws). Continued employment remains on an “at-will” basis.
* Vontas remains and actively participates as an Equal Opportunity Employer/Affirmative Action Employer.


Worker Type:
Regular
Number of Openings Available:
1
We thank all applicants for their interest; however, only those who qualify for an interview will be contacted. \\*Professional recruiting agents or consultants need not call.
company_addresses: 5265 Rockwell Dr NE, Cedar Rapids, IA 52402
company_description: Join our team to help make transit the #1 choice for communities. We’re building Vontas into the #1 choice for transit agencies that need intelligent dispatch and communications technology.

title: Senior Shopify Developer
description:
### **Senior Shopify Developer**


At Cognizant, our global community sets us apart—an upbeat, collaborative and inclusive workplace where everyone can thrive. And with projects at the forefront of innovation, you can build a varied, rewarding career and draw inspiration from dedicated colleagues and leaders. Cognizant is right where you belong.


### **What you’ll do**


* **Lead Development Projects:** Take ownership of the development lifecycle, including planning, design, development, testing, deployment, and maintenance of Shopify Plus solutions.
* **Headless Commerce Implementation:** Architect, develop, and maintain headless commerce solutions using Shopify Plus and modern front-end technologies (e.g., React, Vue.js, Next.js, or similar).
* **API Integration:** Integrate Shopify Plus with various third-party services and APIs to improve functionality and user experience.
* **Custom Development:** Build custom Shopify apps and modify existing features to meet client-specific requirements.
* **Performance Optimization:** Ensure dedication, scalability, and security of e-commerce platforms.
* **Team Leadership:** Mentor and guide junior developers, conduct code reviews, and champion a collaborative and innovative development environment.
* **Client Collaboration:** Work closely with clients to understand their needs, provide technical expertise, and ensure successful project delivery.
* **Stay Updated:** Keep abreast of the latest trends and standard methodologies in Shopify development, headless commerce, and e-commerce technologies.

### **What you bring to the role**


* **Overall experience**: Minimum 6 years in eCommerce or related areas. As well as, experience with eCommerce platforms like Magento, BigCommerce, and/or Kibo Commerce.
* **Shopify Plus Expertise:** At least 4 years of experience with custom development, theme customization, and app integration.
* **Headless Commerce Proficiency:** Hands-on experience with headless commerce architecture and development using technologies like React, Vue.js, Next.js, GraphQL, and REST APIs.
* **Full-Stack Development:** Solid grasp of front-end and back-end technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, and related frameworks.
* **API Development:** Experience in crafting and consuming RESTful and GraphQL APIs.
* **Problem-Solving:** Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to tackle complex issues.
* **Communication:** Strong communication skills to optimally collaborate with clients, team members, and stakeholders.
* **Agile Methodologies:** Experience with Agile development methodologies and practices.
* **DevOps:** Familiarity with DevOps practices and tools for continuous integration and deployment.
* **Certifications:** Shopify or relevant technical certifications.

### **Working arrangements**


We strive to provide flexibility wherever possible. Based on this role’s business requirements, this is a remote position open to qualified applicants in Ontario and/or Nova Scotia, where our hubs are located. Regardless of your working arrangement, we are here to support a healthy work-life balance though our various wellbeing programs.


Note: The working arrangements for this role are accurate as of the date of posting. This may change based on the project you’re engaged in, as well as business and client requirements. Rest assured; we will always be clear about role expectations.
company_addresses: 500 Frank W. Burr Boulevard Teaneck, NJ 07666
company_description: Cognizant helps companies modernize technology, reimagine processes and transform experiences so they stay ahead in a fast-changing world.

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
Agilno is a software development company that helps product-led North American companies plan, design, develop & optimize digital products, driving revenue and engagement. Through technology and close collaboration, our friendly, open-minded, and professional team has created digital products making a huge impact on people's lives for the last 8 years!

  

Position Overview:


We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Full Stack Developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in both front-end and back-end development, with a passion for building scalable and efficient web applications. Reporting to the Project Team Lead, the Full Stack Developer will play a key role in developing and maintaining software projects from concept to completion.

**Requirements:**

* Minimum of 3 years of experience in full stack development.
* Proficiency in front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like React.
* Strong experience with back-end development using Python, Node.js.
* Knowledge of database technologies such as SQL, NoSQL, and experience with database design and management.
* Familiarity with version control systems such as Git.
* Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
* Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team environment.
* Excellent communication skills and ability to translate technical concepts into understandable terms for non-technical stakeholders.
* Excellent knowledge of the English language (written and spoken).

**Responsibilities:**

* Design, develop, and maintain robust and scalable web applications using modern web technologies.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including designers, product managers, and other developers, to define project requirements and deliver solutions that meet client needs.
* Develop front-end components using frameworks such as React, ensuring responsive and intuitive user interfaces.
* Implement server-side logic using Python, Node.js ensuring high performance and security.
* Integrate third-party APIs and services to enhance application functionality.
* Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability, employing best practices in coding and testing.
* Conduct code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members to maintain code quality.
* Stay current with emerging technologies and industry trends, continuously improving development practices and processes.

**Bonus Points:**

* Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS.
* Familiarity with DevOps practices and tools like Docker and Kubernetes.
* Experience in an Agile development environment.
* Previous experience working in a software development agency.

**Benefits:**

* Employment agreement of indefinite duration.
* Eligible candidate must be able to be legally employed in Canada on full time basis.
* Competitive salary based on experience and qualifications: Position salaries are transparent to every team member. For mid level position, a salary ranges between 80K – 100K per year, depending on your level of expertise. By achieving the expected results, you will have a chance to move up the ladder.
* You can expect bonuses for dedicated performance and also a Christmas bonus at the end of the year.
* Collaborative and supportive work environment, fostering innovation and creativity: Working from home or office? It doesn't matter as long as your job is well done. Also, flexible hours give you a balance between your work and private life.
* Opportunities for professional development and career growth: We care about your development and growth. Our internal training program includes cool lectures and workshops, while there is an education budget for external training.
* Paid time off and flexible work hours, promoting work-life balance: In addition to regular vacation days, regardless of the seniority level, all our employees get a one-week vacation bonus.
* Become a Macbook fan like the rest of the team, and let's follow the latest trends in the market. The equipment is yours to use, and you are free to take it with you.
* Health insurance coverage and other employee benefits: Additional health insurance is fully provided by us.
* 20 days per worked year of paid vacation

**How to Apply:** If you meet the qualifications and are excited about the opportunity to join our team, please submit your resume and a cover letter highlighting your relevant experience and accomplishments to ivana@agilno.com

**Additional application instructions or requirements:**

* Only qualified shortlisted candidates will be contacted
* Screened/shortlisted candidates may expect to complete an offline task.

*Agilno* is an equal opportunity employer and values diversity in the workplace. We encourage candidates from all backgrounds to apply.

title: Junior Front End Software Engineer - Canada
Senior Fullstack Developer(Node.js, Java or Ruby on Rails, Angular/React/View)
Senior Fullstack Developer(Node.js, Java or Ruby on Rails, Angular/React/View)
Wordpress Web Developer -Maternity Cover - Canada (Remote)
description:
Salary:   
Job Title: Wordpress Web Developer (Maternity Cover - Remote)

Company: TOOLBX

Location: Canada (remote)

Type: Temporary - Maternity Cover (FT conversion potential)

Website: www.toolbx.com  


  


About TOOLBX:  
  


TOOLBX is on a mission to improve construction material supply chain productivity by simplifying how builders order building supplies and how dealers sell their products through one, unified platform.

Our ecommerce portal solution allows dealers to sell their products online through their own store—boosting store loyalty and scaling their business. By uniting builders and dealers through technology we’re enabling them to be more efficient; improving productivity across the industry.  
  


Job Description:

TOOLBX is seeking a talented and motivated Wordpress Web Developer to join our passionate team of professionals. This is a temporary role covering an upcoming maternity leave, with potential to convert to full time.   
As a web developer at TOOLBX, you will collaborate with cross-functional teams to build out pixel-perfect, fully functional, standards compliant interfaces that enhance the overall user experience and drive business growth.  
  


Responsibilities:

* Develop and maintain high-quality front-end web applications using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript in a Wordpress Environment.
* Collaborate closely with product managers, designers, and other stakeholders to transform designs into functional web pages.
* Implement responsive and mobile-friendly designs to ensure optimal user experience across different devices and screen sizes.
* Optimise web pages for performance and loading speed, ensuring an excellent user experience.
* Collaborate with the back-end development team to integrate front-end interfaces with back-end services via RESTful APIs.
* Conduct thorough testing and debugging of web applications to ensure W3C standards compliance and seamless functionality.
* Stay updated with the latest web development trends, techniques, and best practices.
* Provide recommendations for improving existing front-end markup implementation and overall performance.
* Utilise Figma for efficient collaboration and seamless integration with the design team.
* Implement and customise WordPress themes and plugins to meet specific project requirements.
* Work closely with the marketing team to optimise websites for SEO and performance.
* Communicate effectively with team members, actively participating in code reviews and technical discussions.

Requirements:

* A Wordpress portfolio.
* Strong experience in WordPress development, including theme customization and plugin integration.
* Proven experience as a web developer, with a focus on web design and markup.
* Proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.
* Solid understanding of responsive web design principles and mobile-first development.
* Experience with front-end frameworks and libraries, such as React, Angular, or Vue.js.
* Proficiency in Figma for design collaboration and integration.
* Familiarity with version control systems, preferably Git.
* Strong attention to detail and the ability to transform designs into pixel-perfect, standards compliant web pages.
* Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to debug and resolve issues efficiently.
* Excellent communication and collaboration abilities.
* Self-motivated with the ability to work independently and as part of a remote team.

Nice to Have:

* Familiarity with user experience (UX) principles and best practices.
* Understanding of web accessibility standards and techniques.
* Knowledge of SEO principles and best practices.
* Experience with performance optimization techniques.
* Familiarity with agile development methodologies.

How to Apply:

If you are a passionate Wordpress Developer seeking an exciting opportunity to make a significant impact in the construction industry, please visit our website at https://toolbx.com to apply. Submit your resume, along with a cover letter highlighting your relevant experience and why you are interested in joining TOOLBX. We look forward to reviewing your application and connecting with you soon.

Note: Only selected candidates will be contacted for an interview. TOOLBX is an equal opportunity employer committed to diversity and inclusion in the workplace.

  


  
remote work

For mid level position, a salary ranges between 80K – 100K per year, depending on your level of expertise. By achieving the expected results, you will have a chance to move up the ladder.
* You can expect bonuses for dedicated performance and also a Christmas bonus at the end of the year.
* Collaborative and supportive work environment, fostering innovation and creativity: Working from home or office? It doesn't matter as long as your job is well done. Also, flexible hours give you a balance between your work and private life.
* Opportunities for professional development and career growth: We care about your development and growth. Our internal training program includes cool lectures and workshops, while there is an education budget for external training.
* Paid time off and flexible work hours, promoting work-life balance: In addition to regular vacation days, regardless of the seniority level, all our employees get a one-week vacation bonus.
* Become a Macbook fan like the rest of the team, and let's follow the latest trends in the market. The equipment is yours to use, and you are free to take it with you.
* Health insurance coverage and other employee benefits: Additional health insurance is fully provided by us.
* 20 days per worked year of paid vacation

**How to Apply:** If you meet the qualifications and are excited about the opportunity to join our team, please submit your resume and a cover letter highlighting your relevant experience and accomplishments to ivana@agilno.com

**Additional application instructions or requirements:** 

* Only qualified shortlisted candidates will be contacted
* Screened/shortlisted candidates may expect to complete an offline task.

*Agilno* is an equal opportunity employer and values diversity in the workplace. We encourage candidates from all backgrounds to apply.

title: Junior Front End Software Engineer - Canada
description:
DataVisor is the world’s leading AI-powered Fraud and Risk Platform that delivers the best overall detection coverage in industry. With an open SaaS platform that supports easy consolidation and enrichment of any data, DataVisor's solution scales infinitely and enables organizations to act on fast-evolving fraud and money laundering activities in real time. Its patented unsupervised machine learning technology, advanced device intelligence, powerful decision engine and investigation tools work together to provide guaranteed performance lift from day one. DataVisor's platform is architected to support multiple use cases across different business units flexibly, dramatically lowering total cost of ownership, compared to legacy point solutions. DataVisor is recognized as an industry leader and has been adopted by many Fortune 500 companies across the globe. Our award-winning software platform is powered by a team of world-class experts in big data, machine learning, security, and scalable infrastructure. Our culture is open, positive, collaborative, and results driven.

We are looking for excellent web front-end engineers who can constantly challenge theirselves and surpass themselves. We hope that candidates have a solid development foundation and broad front-end or full-stack development experience. Mature experience in front-end framework and early start-up technology company experience is preferred, we look forward to furthering communication with you!

Responsibility:

1. Develop DataVisor user analysis interface, including data visualization and database interface functionality, and complete the development efficiently tasks;

2. Constantly participate in the development of the Web front-end, back-end development, API interface, etc. of the DataVisor big data analysis platform;

3. Focus on business, and business goals, and exert self-creativity and productivity to achieve business needs

**Requirements**

Basic Qualifications:

* BS degree in Computer Science or relevant field of study
* 2+ years of web development experience, proficient in HTML, CSS, Javascript, Typescript and other related knowledge
* 2+ years of front-end frameworks (such as Angular, React), etc., experience in data visualization is preferred
* Familiar with web testing framework, Java Selenium, experienced in writing E2E test cases/test suites and Unit Tests for frontend code, and also to be able to extend existing applications and have certain experience in performance tuning
* Experienced in Java/Spring programming, familiar with Web back-end development and big data analysis experience is preferred.
* NodeJS server-side development, database interface development experience and SQL proficiency are preferred.
* Proficiency in using git, jenkins and other tools
* Good communication skill including reading and writing skills

**Benefits**

Health Insurance, PTO and retirement plan

title: UI Developer with Web Accessibility - 10 yrs
description:
Role: UI Developer with Web AccessibilityLocation: Toronto  UI Developer with Web Accessibility experience  
 Min. 8+ years of experience working as Front end (UI) developer  
 Web Content Accessibility experience  
  
 Role Description: Design, develop, unit test and support front-end web applications that are responsive and cross-browser compatible. Create reusable components in JavaScript/jQuery/ReactJS. Participate in functional and technical designs. Collaborate with UX architects on web accessible page designs. Experience working with UI specifications and defined style guide. Experience in Requirement Analysis and Estimation. Ensure coding, testing, debugging and implementation activities are completed as required. Ensure web accessibility guidelines (WCAG) are met.  
 Competencies: Digital : HTML5-CSS3, Digital : ReactJS, Web Application Accessibility Standardization and W3C WAI  
  
 Essential Skills: Strong technical skills, with at least 8+ years of development experience in front-end Design and Development. Solid understanding and hands-on experience with HTML5, CSS3, SASS, JavaScript, jQuery, React.js, JSX, Typescript, node.js, Bootstrap, API's, NPM. Hands-on experience with integrating website development and API/web services Proficient with web accessibility (WCAG AA compliancy), Soap/XML, REST/JSON Familiar with using browser developer tools Flexible and adaptable with the ability to align to changing priorities in multiple projects Ability to work both independently and collaborate within a teamDesirable Skills: Hands on experience with Version control/Devops tools(Git, Jenkins, Sourcetree, etc) Experience with assistive tools like JAWS/NVDA Unit testing framework knowledge Have Leadership, Analytical and Communication skills Agile Trained Worked with Highchart and ParsleyJS libraries Knowledge on AEM

title: Sr. Full Stack Developer
description:
**Title: Sr. Full Stack Developer**

**Location: Toronto, ON (Hybrid role)**

**Major Responsibilities:**

* Work with development teams and product managers to ideate software solutions
* Design client-side and server-side architecture
* Build user-facing applications, and reusable components
* Develop and manage well-functioning databases and applications
* Write effective APIs
* Test software to ensure responsiveness and efficiency
* Troubleshoot, debug and upgrade software
* Create security and data protection settings
* Build features and applications with a mobile responsive design
* Write technical documentation

**Mandatory Skills:**

* Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer or similar roles
* **Expertise in WordPress (plugin development), PHP, JavaScript ES6, HTML / CSS / SCSS**
* **Expertise in React.js and its core principles**
* **Knowledge of Next.js is a plus**
* **Experience with popular React.js workflows (such as Flux, Redux, or Context API)**
* **Strong proficiency in JavaScript, including DOM manipulation and the JavaScript object model**
* Experience with databases (e.g. MySQL, Redis, Cassandra)
* Strong knowledge of REST APIs and how they work.
* Proficiency with Git version control system and setting local environments (MAMP, Apache, SSL)
* Nice to have experience with AWS, Heroku, Jenkins, CI/CD
* Knowledge of mobile web development standards
* Excellent communication and teamwork skills
* 5+ years of Web Development
* Great attention to detail, organizational skills, analytical mind
* Degree in Computer Science and/or relevant work experience
